sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit,Renderer2, ElementRef } from '@angular/core'; import { NgbActiveModal } from '@ng-bootstrap/ng-bootstrap'; @Component({ selector: 'app-sign-in', templateUrl: './sign-in.component.html', styleUrls: ['./sign-in.component.css'] }) export class SignInComponent implements OnInit{ constructor(private activeModal: NgbActiveModal,private renderer: Renderer2, private elementRef: ElementRef) { } ngOnInit(): void { } signInEvent() { const container = this.elementRef.nativeElement.querySelector('.container'); if (container) { this.renderer.removeClass(container, 'sign-up-mode'); } } SignUpForm(form:any) { } signUpEvent() { const container = this.elementRef.nativeElement.querySelector('.container'); if (container) { this.renderer.addClass(container, 'sign-up-mode'); } } closeModal() { this.activeModal.close('Modal Closed'); } }
